title: Medial Intertransversarii Lumbora
---


# Origin {#origin}
L1-L5: Mammillary process of inferiorly adjacent vertebrae @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion {#insertion} 
C2-C7: Mammillary process of superiorly adjacent vertebrae @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation {#innervation}
[Spinal nn. (Posterior Rami)]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action {#action}

- **BIL**: Stabilizes and extends cervical and lumbar vertebrae @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- **UNIL**: I/L SB cervical and lumbar spines @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
